name: chessbox64
description:
CHESSBOX 64!!! 64 levels that will take about 64 minutes to complete.

Some levels are super quick while others need strategies to figure out.

The game of chess re-imagined..

Some levels based on real grandmaster games:

Also included is the PSD for you to move around pieces and save as your own png! Use it as a level editor, make your own level pngs and put in the carts folder! Please send what you made so others can play it too! Enjoy. verseability@aol.com
